ddi:stdyInfo.ddi:abstract: Interest and exposure to mass-media / political problems / government spending and taxation / political preference / ( 1 ) threat to freedom / opinions on military service and military spending / ( 2 ) opinions on pornography / definition of porno / opinions on homosexuality / abortion / public order and behaviour of police / politicians in favour of law and order / ( 3 ) opinions on the housing problem / type of dwelling / satisfaction with housing / subsidies / having a say in plans / who profit by government policy in housing / ( 4 ) government policy to stop inflation / influence of employers, trade unions on government / which social welfare laws should be limited / opinions on social welfare / opinions on egalitarian income policies / opinions on the 1971-census / ( 5 ) opinions on airpollution and waterpollution ( government policies ) / opinions on noise pollution / ( 6 ) opinions on politics in general / government / political parties / M.P.'s / parliament / expectations of gain or loss in next elections / opinions on political process / political interest and exposure to newscomments / voting motivation / ( 7 ) after election evaluation of results / who for prime-minister / voting motivation / motivation for not voting / opinions on the way politicians express themselves / government spending. Background variables: basic characteristics/ residence/ housing situation/ household characteristics/ occupation/employment/ income/capital assets/ education/ politics/ religion/ consumption of durables/ organizational membership
